verse: The Eternal One spoke to Moses and Aaron.
This is the organization of Israelites according to the twelve extended familiesâ€”603,550 total arms-bearing troops.
Of course, this does not include the Levite organization because the Eternal commanded Moses not to count them.

And things went according to plan. Just as the Eternal had commanded Moses, the Israelites organized and camped and traveled by the twelve clans and their extended families, each with its own banner. Then they left.
